name: pyscf_front
description: A quantum chemical calculation app using Electron, React, and Python.

scripts.dev: rimraf dist && npm run codegen && run-p dev:webpack dev:electron
scripts.build: npm run codegen && npm run build:webpack && npm run build:python
scripts.build:python: rimraf python_dist && cd src/python && bash -c 'if [ "$CONDA_DEFAULT_ENV" = "pyscf-env" ]; then pyinstaller --distpath ../../python_dist --workpath ../../build/pyinstaller --noconfirm pyscf_front_api.spec; elif source $HOME/miniforge3/etc/profile.d/conda.sh 2>/dev/null && conda activate pyscf-env 2>/dev/null; then pyinstaller --distpath ../../python_dist --workpath ../../build/pyinstaller --noconfirm pyscf_front_api.spec; else env -u VIRTUAL_ENV uv run pyinstaller --distpath ../../python_dist --workpath ../../build/pyinstaller --noconfirm pyscf_front_api.spec; fi'
scripts.codegen: npm run codegen:python && npm run codegen:typescript
scripts.codegen:python: cd src/python && bash -c 'if [ "$CONDA_DEFAULT_ENV" = "pyscf-env" ]; then datamodel-codegen --input ../../src/api-spec/openapi.yaml --output generated_models.py --output-model-type pydantic_v2.BaseModel --field-constraints --use-schema-description; elif source $HOME/miniforge3/etc/profile.d/conda.sh 2>/dev/null && conda activate pyscf-env 2>/dev/null; then datamodel-codegen --input ../../src/api-spec/openapi.yaml --output generated_models.py --output-model-type pydantic_v2.BaseModel --field-constraints --use-schema-description; else env -u VIRTUAL_ENV uv run datamodel-codegen --input ../../src/api-spec/openapi.yaml --output generated_models.py --output-model-type pydantic_v2.BaseModel --field-constraints --use-schema-description; fi'
scripts.python-exec: bash -c 'if [ "$CONDA_DEFAULT_ENV" = "pyscf-env" ]; then "$@"; elif source $HOME/miniforge3/etc/profile.d/conda.sh 2>/dev/null && conda activate pyscf-env 2>/dev/null; then "$@"; else env -u VIRTUAL_ENV uv run "$@"; fi' --
